name: Pixel Ninja Bengal #14
description: AI-generated pixel ninja cat. A Common Bengal ninja with Shuriken skills.

backstory.name: Claw Blade
backstory.origin: Born in the hidden valleys of the Eastern Digital Realm, this Bengal ninja was recognized for exceptional tracking abilities from an early age. The distinctive spotted coat pattern provides perfect camouflage during network infiltration missions.
backstory.training: Under the guidance of Master Kiyoto, Claw Blade spent years mastering the Water techniques, achieving the rank of Adept after passing the Trial of Defense.
backstory.currentRole: Now a Adept ninja, Claw Blade specializes in the Defense stance while wielding a Shuriken, channeling the power of Water to secure the blockchain against those who would disrupt its harmony.

special_abilities: Multi-Chain Attack - Can simultaneously target multiple networks with deadly accuracy
Flow Adaptation - Can seamlessly navigate between different blockchain protocols
Firewall Fortress - Creates an impenetrable defense against external threats
